sentences.en: By pushing aside unpleasant thoughts they merely repress these thoughts.
sentences.cn: 他们对不愉快的想法不予理会，其结果仅仅是压制了这些想法。

sentences.en: Her manner seemed unpleasant at first, but she improved on further acquaintance.
sentences.cn: 起初她的举止让人很不愉快, 但是经过进一步接触她改了许多.

sentences.en: It made things very unpleasant in a way.
sentences.cn: 这把事情弄得有点不大愉快。

sentences.en: It was a very unpleasant and frightening attack.
sentences.cn: 那是一次非常恶劣且骇人的攻击。

sentences.en: Norman and I were deputed for the unpleasant task.
sentences.cn: 我和诺曼被委派去干这件苦差事.

sentences.en: She felt herself blanch at the unpleasant memories.
sentences.cn: 一回想起那些不愉快的事情，她觉得自己的脸刷地就白了。

sentences.en: She thought him an unpleasant man.
sentences.cn: 她认为他是个粗鲁的人。

sentences.en: The aeroplane was gyrating about the sky in a most unpleasant fashion.
sentences.cn: 飞机在空中盘旋，令人不堪忍受。

sentences.en: The minerals in the water made it unpleasant to drink.
sentences.cn: 水里的矿物质使得这水挺难喝的。

sentences.en: The plant has an unpleasant odour and an acrid taste.
sentences.cn: 这种植物闻着刺鼻，吃着辣口。

sentences.en: The skunk gives off an unpleasant smell when attacked.
sentences.cn: 受到攻击时臭鼬会发出一种难闻的气味.

sentences.en: The symptoms can be uncomfortable, unpleasant and serious.
sentences.cn: 那些症状可能令人不适，很不舒服甚至会比较严重。

sentences.en: The vacuum has an unpleasant smell.
sentences.cn: 那个真空吸尘器有股很难闻的气味。

sentences.en: They've been trying to push all the unpleasant jobs on me again.
sentences.cn: 他们一直想把所有讨厌的工作再次往我身上推.

words.tran_cn: 令人不愉快地，不讨人喜欢地
不愉快；不愉快的事，煞风景的事

trans.tran_cn: 使人不愉快的，不合意的，讨厌的，不客气的
